nodes.label: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . deposit_account ;
acct . deposit_amount = acct . deposit_amount . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
acct . deposit_count = acct . deposit_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . depositor . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . deposit_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += amount ;
